hero.title: Never Lose Another Sock Again
hero.subtitle: SockBuddy uses AI to help you manage your sock collection, track pairs, and find missing socks.

features.title: Smart Sock Management
features.subtitle: Our AI-powered features make sock management effortless and even fun.

items.title: Sock Finder
items.description: Take a photo of a single sock and our AI will help you find its match in your collection.

items.title: Pair Tracker
items.description: Keep track of all your sock pairs and get notified when a sock goes missing.

items.title: Outfit Matcher
items.description: Our AI suggests the perfect socks to match your outfit based on color and style.

how_it_works.title: Powered by Advanced AI
how_it_works.subtitle: Our sophisticated algorithms make sock management smarter than ever.

steps.title: Computer Vision
steps.description: Our AI uses advanced computer vision to identify sock patterns, colors, and materials from photos you take.

steps.title: Pattern Matching
steps.description: The system learns your sock collection over time and can identify pairs with 99% accuracy.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that works best for your sock collection.

cta.title: Ready to Organize Your Sock Drawer?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of happy users who never lose a sock again.
